channel.title: Drawing on BennuGD
channel.description: Recent content in Drawing on BennuGD

item.title: put()
item.description: Definition INT put ( <INT fileID> , <INT graphID> , <INT x> , <INT y> ) Draws (blits) a graph onto the background. For more advanced blitting, see: xput() map_put() map_xput() map_xputnp() Parameters INT fileID - The file that holds the graph. INT graphID - The graph to draw with. INT x - Where on the background’s x-axis to put the graph. INT y - Where on the background’s y-axis to put the graph.
